languages.text: "Но ты позарился на ее трон, как же иначе! Ее всю жизнь окружали сволочи и завистники. Оступишься — обглодают и не раскаятся".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Но ты позарился на ее трон, как же иначе! Ее всю жизнь окружали сволочи и завистники. Оступишься — обглодают и не раскаятся".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought the moment she made a single misstep."
languages.original_text: "Но ты позарился на ее трон, как же иначе! Ее всю жизнь окружали сволочи и завистники. Оступишься — обглодают и не раскаятся".

traits.locale_text: "But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought as soon as she made a single misstep."
"But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought as soon as she made a single misstep."
"But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought the moment she made a single misstep."
"But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought the moment she made a single misstep."
"But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought the moment she made a single misstep."
"But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought the moment she made a single misstep."

languages.text: “但你确实打算篡夺她的王位，我没说错吧？她这辈子身边到处都是那些嫉妒她的渣滓。但凡她稍微走错一步，那些人就会毫不犹豫，把她生吞活剥。”
languages.original_text: "But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought the moment she made a single misstep."

traits.locale_text: “但你确实打算篡夺她的王位，我没说错吧？她这辈子身边到处都是那些嫉妒她的渣滓。但凡她稍微走错一步，那些人就会毫不犹豫，把她生吞活剥。”

languages.text: «Pero quería su trono, ¿verdad? Se pasó toda la vida rodeada de canallas que la envidiaban, preparados para devorarla sin la menor duda en cuanto cometiera un solo error».
languages.original_text: "But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought the moment she made a single misstep."

traits.locale_text: «Pero quería su trono, ¿verdad? Se pasó toda la vida rodeada de canallas que la envidiaban, preparados para devorarla sin la menor duda en cuanto cometiera un solo error».

languages.text: « Mais vous vouliez son trône, n'est-ce pas ? Tout au long de sa vie, elle a été entourée de scélérats qui la jalousaient, prêts à la détruire au premier faux pas. »
languages.original_text: "But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought the moment she made a single misstep."

traits.locale_text: « Mais vous vouliez son trône, n'est-ce pas ? Tout au long de sa vie, elle a été entourée de scélérats qui la jalousaient, prêts à la détruire au premier faux pas. »

languages.text: 「でも、あなたは彼女の玉座を望んだんでしょう？彼女の生涯を通じて、周りには彼女を羨む悪党たちがいて、ほんの一歩でも間違えれば、躊躇なく彼女を食い尽くそうとしていた」
languages.original_text: "But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought the moment she made a single misstep."

traits.locale_text: 「でも、あなたは彼女の玉座を望んだんでしょう？彼女の生涯を通じて、周りには彼女を羨む悪党たちがいて、ほんの一歩でも間違えれば、躊躇なく彼女を食い尽くそうとしていた」

languages.text: "Sen onun tahtını istedin, değil mi? Tüm hayatı boyunca etrafı onu kıskanan, tek bir yanlış adım attığında onu tereddüt etmeden yutmaya hazır alçaklarla çevriliydi."
languages.original_text: "But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought the moment she made a single misstep."

traits.locale_text: "Sen onun tahtını istedin, değil mi? Tüm hayatı boyunca etrafı onu kıskanan, tek bir yanlış adım attığında onu tereddüt etmeden yutmaya hazır alçaklarla çevriliydi."

languages.text: "Aber Ihr wolltet ihren Thron, oder nicht? Ihr ganzes Leben war sie von Schurken umgeben, die sie beneideten und bereit waren, sie ohne Nachdenken zu zerfleischen, sobald sie sich nur einen Fehltritt leistete."
languages.original_text: "But you wanted her throne, didn't you? Her whole life, she was surrounded by scoundrels who envied her, ready to devour her without a second thought the moment she made a single misstep."

traits.locale_text: "Aber Ihr wolltet ihren Thron, oder nicht? Ihr ganzes Leben war sie von Schurken umgeben, die sie beneideten und bereit waren, sie ohne Nachdenken zu zerfleischen, sobald sie sich nur einen Fehltritt leistete."
